page.title: 08PIREHILL FARMS
page.content: There are 4 farms on Pirehill. The first 2 are owned by Staffs. C.Council and farmed by tenants. 1. OAK FARM (46 acres). Mr B.Lichfield,farmed since March 1984 (had problems when Common Market Milk Quota was introduced in April 1984) Dairy Farm 34 Friesians, 15 other livestock mostly Hereford. Land pasture 2. NEW HOUSE FARM (50 acres) Mr K.Barlow. 20 dairy heifers, 64 beef cattle,1000 hens. He sells his eggs locally. Some corn with grassland. 3. NORTH PIREHILL FARM (250 acres) A.J.Weaver & Son. Mixed; grain, beef, sheep (200) and pigs (400). 4. PIREHILL GRANGE (220 acres) Mr P.Brown. Some arable, sheep, livestock (100). Very heavy land.
